title: on lock screen it keeps asking for pin over and over again, won't let me access the phone
content:
I did restarts, shut down and start, restarting from the boot loader.
when i put my pin in it goes to a black screen for a second and back to asking for pin number.
I have done a factory reset and that has solved the issue.
now this is a new phone replacement for my old pixel xl which I've got less then a week ago and I'm just trying to make sure it's not a hardware issue, which to me it seems like a weird software issue that I can't seem to be able to find any information anywhere, as in like it has never happened to anyone else.
